title: Patch Notes
content:
ixed a bug causing non-Dark-Urge avatars to say Dark Urge lines. You're not all obliged to be wretched things with headaches. Fixed a bug where difficulty and game settings wouldn't save properly when adjusted after experiencing a Game Over in Honour Mode.

Fixed an issue causing neutral NPCs to trigger combat for seemingly no reason. Cerys will stop getting involved in combats with Minthara from across the region. An eager beaver no longer. Fixed a bug causing damage riders to be added multiple
